properties.publicRemarks: Beautiful 19.46 Acres of Flat Vacant Land on Tehachapi Willow Springs Rd in Tehachapi, California.  Easy Access off Paved Road with Power in Street only 1.5 Miles From Hwy 58! Great Street Frontage and Rectangular Lot Dimensions of 679 Feet x 1,274 Feet. Zoned A-1, Agricultural, with a Variety of Uses from Farming, Vineyards, Solar Farm, Ranch, Orchard, Nursury, Equestrian and Residential Uses! Peaceful Location to Build a New Ranch Home Surrounded by Breathtaking Mountain Views! Tehachapi is Becoming a Popular Destination for Wineries. The Tehachapi Mountains has Received Accreditation for its Award Winning Wines, Local Vintners can now Label Their Bottles of Wines as The Tehachapi Mountains American Viticultural Area, Competing with Other Well Known AVA's Such As Napa, Sonoma and Paso Robles! Previously Used for Certified Organic Farming, So No Pesticides in Soil!  Owner Will Carry Easy Seller Financing with Negotiable Terms! Kern County APN #223-360-15-00-4.  Adjacent 40 Acres Also Available For Sale! Great Investment Opportunity!
